Connect with devicesÂ¶

Any lab-streaming-layer (LSL) or openvibe supported devices are compatible with our GUI because the data communication module is based on LSL protocol. I have connected NeuroElectric (NE) system by their default software, which will be shown below. Other devices including Gtec Gusbamp and BrainProduct were connected through Openvibe.

  • Open NE software

  • Connect with USB

  • Load NE protocol and enable LSL output. Note NE protocol only controls the channels selected, not to be confused with experimental protocol in our GUI.

  • Visualize data in NE window
